sentences: Seye Adelekan (born 15 May 1988), sometimes known mononymously as Seye ( SHAY-uh), is a Nigerian British bassist, musician and singer-songwriter, best known for his work as the live bassist for Gorillaz.
Seye Adelekan was born in Nigeria to a father who worked in the oil industry.
He grew up in Lagos, Netherlands, Ecuador and south-east London.
In 2012 Seye released his debut solo single "White Noise".
Seye toured with Lana del Rey, Emeli Sand√© and worked as session musician for Paloma Faith, before joining Gorillaz in 2017.
